DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare non invasive treatment use YAG Didode Laser reduce volume fat .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Investigation Non Invasive Fat Reduction
DOC.criteria: A healthy nonsmoking male female 2060 year age Subjects present excess abdominal tissue ( fat skin ) , candidate abdominoplasty procedure willing allow use device skin Subjects allow excess skin remove part abdominoplasty send laboratory analysis Understand accept obligation associate procedure Subjects Fitzpatrick skin type I III . Subjects willing consent participate study ask undergo biopsy , ultrasound measurement , blood testing outline group define section 6.0 . Subjects must agree maintain diet exercise regime throughout study Any previous liposuction/liposculpture type procedure abdominal area past 6 month A history allergic reaction medication anesthesia require procedure A history thrombophlebitis A history acute infection A history heart failure Received anticipate receive antiplatelets , anticoagulant , thrombolytic , vitamin E antiinflammatories within 2 week pre treatment Intolerance anesthesia medication prescribed procedure . Any medical condition , , investigator 's opinion would interfere patient 's participation study include EMLA cream percocet Taking medication photosensitive A history keloid formation A study subject must pregnant pregnant last 3 month The physician right make determination eligibility he/she deem clinically significant base standard care treatment
